courses.name: Inspec Profile Developer Course
courses.desc: This course teaches the basics of writing and running InSpec test profiles. Note that basic knowledge of Ruby and CLI familiarity is required.
bullets: Learn about the InSpec framework and its capabilities
Write your own test profiles to learn InSpec profile architecture and best practices
Report, view, and analyze InSpec test results

courses.name: Inspec Advanced Developer Course
courses.desc: This course provides a deep dive into InSpec's advanced capabilities.
bullets: Learn to use profile inheritance techniques to run multiple profiles against a target
Develop your own InSpec resource objects to cover application stack components
Expand your test-writing skills to handle more use cases
